attributes.action: get Bad Lashes back on X Factor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We think it is an absolute outrage that Bad Lashes were voted off the wonderful X Factor TV show ahead of the awful Girl Band.
We feel this is an injustice and that Gordon Brown should use his position to get the wonderful Louis Walsh's group back where they belong.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
